tossup_question: 2) PHYSICS  What is the maximum height that can be attained by a projectile?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Equal to its Maximum Range
X) Half of its Maximum Range
Y) One-fourth of its Maximum Range
Z) Twice its Maximum Range
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Y) One-fourth of its Maximum Range
bonus_question: 2) PHYSICS  Which of the following conditions is true for an object to be in stable equilibrium?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) No linear force on the object
X) No rotational force on the object
Y) Minimum Potential Energy of the Object
Z) All of the Above
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Z) All of the Above
